welcome_text:
Dear and respected guests!
We are pleased to welcome you to our family restaurant «Dilkash Shirin taom» where national and Turkish dishes are prepared!
«Dilkash Shirin taom» family restaurant is a combination of Turkish and European cuisine.
🌙 We invite our dear compatriots and guests of our country to the fabulous Dilkash family restaurant, we are ready to offer you delicious and delicious dishes that you will like
🍽 The menu of our restaurant includes more than 120 dishes of various nationalities, more than 25 cold dishes and more than 30 salads
✅ National restaurant delivery service Dilkash 🥘 
📲 Order from 9:00 to 22:00😋
☎️ 97 616 08 88 
————————————————————————————
✅'Dilkash Milliy Taomlar' restaurant delivery service 🥘
📲 Order from 9:00 to 22:00😋
☎️ 97 616 08 88
